Santa_Clara.SoFA District:
SoFA (South of First Area) is an arts, cultural, and entertainment district of Downtown San Jose, California.
Home to numerous cultural institutions, art galleries, and theatre companies, including the San Jose Institute of Contemporary Art, the San José Opera, and the Silicon Valley Symphony, SoFA bids itself as "Silicon Valley's Creative District".


== History ==

The commercial street had been a major retail district of San Jose in the late 1800s and early part of the 20th century, but by the 1970s had fallen into decline along with much of downtown San Jose as the city expanded and retail moved to suburban shopping centers.
